ygData.subject: Re: hunting spots
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm, well, we actually just left west commons, the kodiaks seemed a little slow and not much fight in them.. Guk? ewww, heh, guk fun and fast paced, but geesh.
ygData.messageBody:
hmm, well, we actually just left west commons, the kodiaks seemed a little
slow and not much fight in them..
Guk? ewww, heh, guk fun and fast paced, but geesh. whadda death trap
Seems like endless trains of greens and blues.....gotta lov guk, but seems
like good place to lose a few levels rather than gain em...8)
Morgul
